name: The Lone Herdsman
description:
An entry for Weekly Game Jam 84: Alone.

An old shepherd need to prepare a few things before full moon night. Of course, as the wiseman said, "If anything can go wrong, it will." Not too bad, though.

Control:

- Click on object to interact with it

- Choose your action by number on your keyboard.

Credits:

- Art: SomeFarang

- Music: Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
